REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1218 reute r f BC-BLOCKER-ENERGY-<BLK> 04-08 0065

TEXT.TITLE: BLOCKER ENERGY <BLK> SHARE OFFERING UNDERWAY
TEXT.BODY: Blocker Energy corp said an offering of 20 mln common shares is underway at 2.625 dlrs per share through underwriters led by <Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc> and Alex. Brown and Sons Inc <ABSB>. The company is offering 19.7 mln shares and shareholders the rest. Before the offering it had about 33.6 mln shares outstanding. Reuter
